name: Have their cake and eat it too
name_original: Have their cake and eat it too
description:
A very very very loose adaption of the paper 'How Populist Radical Right Parties Can Have Their EU Cake and Eat It' 

 It's not easy being a populist leader! 

A pesky journo approaches you and is demanding statements on the European Union... What do you say? How do you make it through alive?
